TextView.android:text: System to open second reading if first reading is 38.0, after asking the mother to unwrap the baby if wrapped in the blanket or sheet and again note the second reading after 10 minutes

\n System dosri reading k option tak kholay ga jab pehli reading 38.0 ya us sa zayda ai gee, maa ko bolain k bachay ko agar kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapaita howa ha tu wo utar dain and 10 mins k baad phir reading lain

\n System dosri reading ka option tab kholay ga jab pehli reading 35.5 sa kaam ho gee, maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko dhood peelay, bachay k gilay kapray agar han tu wo utar day and bachay ko kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapait day and 10 min baad reading lain

\n System dosri reading ka option tab kholay ga jab pehli reading 35.5 sa kaam ho gee, maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko dhood peelay, bachay k gilay kapray agar han tu wo utar day and bachay ko kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapait day and 10 min baad reading lain
